items.title: Havells India wraps up FY25 with strong earnings in Q4
items.description: Revenue growth remains strong; however, margins were impacted due to a change in the product mix

items.title: Hold Rajratan Global Wire target of Rs 394: East India Securities
items.description: East India Securities recommended hold rating on Rajratan Global Wire with a target price of Rs 394 in its research report dated April 23, 2025.

items.title: AU SFB Q4 FY25 – Will the stock rerate?
items.description: High visibility of an RoA uptick on lower credit cost and possibility of a universal banking licence

items.title: HCL Tech Q4 FY25: Standing tall amid the macro chaos
items.description: The commentary is positive and the guidance impressive

items.title: Agri Picks Report April 23, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Indian farmers have sown summer crops across 6.88 million hectares as of Friday, up 15.2% on year from 5.97 million hectares sown in the same period a year ago, according to data released by the agriculture ministry relased on Monday.

items.title: HCL Tech shares jump 7% as brokerages draw neutral ratings on in-line Q4
items.description: HCL Tech's  cautious outlook and a soft performance in new deal total contract values (TCVs) during Q4 tempered overall optimism

items.title: Ashoka Buildcon shares up 4% on project win worth Rs 568.86 cr from Central Railway
items.description: Ashoka Buildcon Share Price | On March 10, the company received LoA from Maharashtra State Electricity Transmission Co (MSETCL) for a project of Rs 311.92 crore.

items.title: PNC Infratech shares extend gains on 7th day, rises 2% on project win
items.description: PNC Infratech Share Price | The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 574.50 and a 52-week low of Rs 235.70 on 27 May, 2024 and 07 April, 2025, respectively.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Sensex, Nifty off day's high; IT index up 3%, PSU Bank down
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: BSE Midcap and Smallcap indices are trading flat. Waaree Energies, HDFC Bank, HCL Tech, Dixon Technologies, Infosys are among most active shares on the NSE. Among sectors, IT index up 3 percent, while PSU Bank, metal, oil & gas, media, consumer durables down 0.5-1 percent.

items.title: Gensol Engineering now under EoW lens as lender PFC files complaint
items.description: Power Finance Corporation Ltd (PFC) said it is exploring all possible options to recover an outstanding principal amount of Rs 307 crore from Gensol Engineering Ltd.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The Foreign institutional investors (FIIs) extended their buying on fifth day as they bought equities worth Rs 1290 crore on April 22. However, Domestic institutional investors (DIIs) sold equities of Rs 885 crore on the same day.

items.title: Here is what experts say about the strongest sectoral leaders and laggards of current market rally
items.description: Experts are hopeful for the continuation of this market rally despite intermittent consolidation, anticipating the Nifty may move toward its previous record high 26,277 in the coming months driven by rate sensitives and domestic themes than global.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Lupin, Aarti Industries, Phoenix Mills, Choice International, APL Apollo Tubes, Pennar, and others on April 23?
items.description: The positive momentum is expected to persist in the upcoming sessions, despite potential consolidation. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: HCL Tech, Ashoka Buildcon, PNC Infratech, Airtel, Bharat Forge, Cyient DLM, M&M Financial, RBL Bank in focus on 23 April
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 23 Apr: Stocks like Mahindra & Mahindra Financial Services, Tata Communications, Waaree Energies, AU Small Finance Bank, Huhtamaki India, Delta Corp, 360 ONE WAM, Power Finance Corporation, Varun Beverages, Gokaldas Exports, and Ambuja Cements will be in focus on April 23.

items.title: Ahead of Q4 results, LTI Mindtree shares jump 5%, Bajaj Housing Finance in red, Tata Consumer sees choppy trade
items.description: LTI Mindtree is also expected to declare a final dividend for the previous financial year.

items.title: Bank Nifty snaps six-day rally to slip 1.5% from day's high, Canara, HDFC Bank top laggards
items.description: The selloff comes a day after the bank index hit a record high of 55,961 for the first time, including several bank shares touching fresh highs. The fall in share prices may be driven by profit booking after the recent upmove.

items.title: AU Small Finance shares soar 5% on profit growth and lower NPAs, but analysts cautious on credit cost
items.description: The analyst sentiment around AU Small's shares remained divided, with Morgan Stanley cheering the resilient RoA and asset quality outlook, while Citi and Nuvama flagging rising credit costs and stress in the card portfolio.

items.title: Mahindra Finance’s re-rating hinges on diversification strategy, steady credit cost
items.description: Cost tailwinds, better mix, and higher fee-based income to drive RoA

items.title: How a falling market and tighter regulations impacted brokers
items.description: A falling market and SEBI’s regulatory clampdown have hit brokerages hard, slashing both client counts and profitability. But are we seeing green shoots of recovery?

items.title: FII buying streak extends to 6th day with Rs 3,333 crore inflow; DIIs sell Rs 1,234 crore
items.description: For the year so far, FIIs have been net sellers of shares worth Rs 1.53 lakh crore, while DIIs have net bought Rs 1.97 lakh crore worth of shares.

items.title: Maruti Suzuki Q4 Preview: Margin, profit may decline on higher discounts, ad spends
items.description: Shareholders should watch out for updates on the company’s orderbook and inventory levels, along with details on the upcoming e-Vitara launch and its expected volumes.

items.title: Small & midcap stocks back in the mix; outpace bluechips in latest market rally
items.description: Experts say that India-centric companies have led this move, as they’re shielded from global disruptions.

items.title: Small, midcap indices extend gaining streak to 7 days; here are the top gainers
items.description: The Nifty Midcap index closed 1.18 percent higher at 55,041, while Nifty Smallcap index ended the session with marginal gains at 16,969.75.

items.title: Jyothy Labs: Raising the bar in fabric care premiumization| Stock of the Day| Markets
items.description: Jyothy commenced its operations as a proprietary concern to manufacture and sell a single product (Ujala fabric whitener) in a single district in Kerala. Over the years, it has grown and diversified to become a multi-brand, multi-product company with operations across the country. Now, its product portfolio includes reputed brands such as Ujala, Henko, Mr. White, Maxo, Exo and Margo, among others.

items.title: Taking Stock: Markets extend gains for 7th day; Nifty above 24,300, Sensex up 521 pts, led by IT stocks
items.description: On the sectoral front, IT index jumped 4 percent, auto index added more than 2 percent, while PSU Bank, consumer durables indices were down 0.5-1 percent.

items.title: Lupin shares rise on US launch of kidney drug Tolvaptan; $200 million revenue seen by FY26
items.description: The drug, a copy of Jynarque, could add up to $200 million in annual revenue by FY26, strengthening Lupin’s foothold in complex generics and supporting its margin recovery strategy.

items.title: Live: Nifty Tops 24,300 Led By IT Shares; Nifty Bank Cools Off After Hitting New High | Closing Bell
items.description: Nifty gains for 7th straight day. Midcap index gains over a percent. NSE advance-decline ratio at 1:1. Nifty Bank retreats after crossing 56,000. IT top sectoral gainer post HCL Tech Q4. IT, autos, realty & pharma top movers. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Motas as they break down the market action and share the stocks on their radar.

items.title: Shriram Properties buys prime Bengaluru plot for residential project with GDV of up to Rs 250 crore
items.description: Shriram Properties said it plans to develop a premium residential complex with row houses or villas on the land, and the project is set to have a gross development value (GDV) of Rs 200-250 crore.

items.title: PFC shares under pressure as firm files complaint against Gensol at EoW
items.description: Power Finance Corporation (PFC) has filed a complaint with the Economic Offences Wing against Gensol Engineering, alleging document falsification in an EV leasing loan. Of the Rs 352 crore disbursed in 2023, Rs 307 crore remains unpaid.

items.title: Coforge, HCL Tech, Wipro, other IT shares jump up to 7% amid hopes of easing trade tensions
items.description: The IT index jumped 4%, contributing more than half of the benchmark index's gains. Indian IT companies get a substantial chunk of revenue from the US.

items.title: Markets rise for 7th day: Sensex reclaims 80k, Nifty above 24,300 as IT, auto, pharma stocks rally
items.description: In today’s session, the broader market showed a robust trend. The Nifty Midcap 100 rose over 1 percent, while the Smallcap 100 gained 0.4 percent.

items.title: Vardhman Special shares up 20% despite weak results on Rs 2,000 crore capex plan
items.description: Despite muted market demand, the proposed greenfield project has infused investor confidence, boosting shares of Vardhman Steel a day after the Q4FY25 result announcement.
